title: Richard Scarry's Busy, Busy Town
description: Richard Scarry's classic book that takes readers all around town!Join Lowly Worm, Huckle Cat, and other beloved characters for a day in  Richard Scarry's Busy, Busy Town.  Visit the school, the farm, the post office, and many more fun and exciting places in this classic book that teaches little ones all about what goes on in their very own communities.
author: Richard Scarry
